Penalty on ARZ-33-J.Scobey, Illegal Forward Pass, declined.

Laterals on a kickoff return by the losing team are ignored when the kickoff is the final play of the game. Also, Scobey gets credit for the return, not Hodgins, because he was the final player to touch the ball.
